<?php
        $to = ""someone@example.com"";
        $subject = ""Test mail"";
        $message = ""Hello! This is a simple email message."";
        $from = ""someonelse@example.com"";
        $headers = ""From:"" . $from;
        mail($to,$subject,$message,$headers);
        echo ""Mail Sent."";
    
    ?>
